ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

  • <<<<<<< HEAD
    Classes in ca.mcgill.ecse211.project used by ca.mcgill.ecse211.project 
    Class Description
    LightLocalization
    Class for odometry correction and robot localization using light sensors.
    =======     		LightLocalization
    This class will provide methods to perform odometer correction using light sensors which are sampled by the LightSensorPoller thread.
    >>>>>>> 734879bde85f4e473bd47423d2392301dec18881
    LightSensorPoller.COLOUR
    Possible color types detected by color sensor
    Navigation
    Class containing all methods used to navigate ev3 about the board, uses an instance of LightLocalization class to incorporate odometery correction.
    Odometer
    The odometer class keeps track of the robot's (x, y, theta) position.
    RobotClaw
    This class is used to control the claw of the robot used for the rescue process of the vehicle, it is implemented as singleton to ensure only one object of RobotClaw is created.
